EmailTemplate.name: Subscription Management w. Double Opt-in.EMAIL-Opt-in Old
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirm your subscription
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for connecting with us. If you would like to be kept in the loop on our popular webinar series, newsletters and educational content, please click below to confirm.
At any time, you can visit our Subscription Center <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/subscription-management.html]]> to edit your preferences.
The Pivotal Team Click here to be kept in the loop! http://connect.pivotal.io/subscription-management-confirm.html
